about_the_game:
Hollowmoor is a cozy magic life sim, set in the sleepy town of Hollowmoor. As a budding young Witch or Wizard you’ll need to manage your farm and explore the mystical world to gather your ingredients. Brew potions! Forge enchantments! Complete orders for the townsfolks and learn their stories! Bring magic back to Hollowmoor!






As the only Witch or Wizard in town, you’ll need to grow and nurture your own seasonal crops and raise mythical animals to ensure you have just the right ingredients for when an order for a potion or enchantment comes in.






With over 100 recipes, you'll need to learn on your feet the how to make a perfect potions. Some can be used for in game boosts to things such as speed or luck as you explore the world. Others will be requested by the one of many Townsfolk of Hollowmoor as you complete orders and increase your standing in the town.






With over 20 unique townsfolk, Hollowmoor is a bustling town where as a young Witch or Wizard you could thrive! Each resident has their own daily routines, as well as stories to tell you as you get to know them. They will also have orders you can complete for gold.

Gold can be used to buy more unusual ingredients, upgrade your tools or to decorate your home!



There are many secrets to be uncovered in hollowmoor and you’ll need to take your time to earn the trust of the townsfolk. Seasonal festivals will ensure there is always something going on when you drop in to Hollowmoor.






With many of the residents looking for love, as friendships progress you might just find a suitable suiter. Each eligible resident has their unique dating cutscenes and additional story arcs.






Visit the quint countryside town with a hosts of shops and cafes, or head down to the docks for more exotic goods and items. Step into the forest and mines surrounding Hollowmoor to discover rare items and even mythical creatures. Take the train to other towns and interact with the nearby rival township of Great Yearning. And perhaps most importantly explore the ruins of a forgotten magic school and restore it to its lost glory, making Hollowmoor a beacon of magic in England again!

With a lot see you’ll need a way to get around, and what better way than by broom! Learn to fly and upgrade your trusty broom get around as fast as possible!




  • Run your own magical delivery services, brew potions, forge enchantments and make sure they get to the recipients on time!
  • Go adventuring in the forests and mines, collect rare ingredients and meet mythical creatures.
  • Tend to your crops to create various ingredients that will become the bedrock of your potion brewing business.
  • Develop relationships with NPC’s who have their own stories, discover more about the town and the people who live there.
  • Decipher clues to unlock the secrets and discover even more of the magical surroundings.
  • Customise your character to be whoever you want to be! Forge you own story in Hollowmoor!
